meanings.definition: Eager to share one's beliefs or persuade others to adopt them.
meanings.sent1: She had an evangelistic personality, always ready to talk about her passions.
meanings.sent2: His evangelistic nature made him a natural leader in the community.
meanings.sent3: The evangelistic penguin tried to convince all the other penguins to wear bow ties.
meanings.sent4: Her evangelistic enthusiasm was like a beacon guiding others.
meanings.sent5: The evangelistic fervor in her eyes was impossible to ignore.
